name: 32bitCoffee MS1
description:
32BitCoffee is set in a futuristic hyper connected city. Lake Front is a city where artificial intelligence is used to monitor and benefit the daily lives of the citizens. OMEGA, the world's leading first class organization in the area of all things science and technology, is responsible for the hypernetwork and the various AI testing labs in Lake Front, ushering people of different races and backgrounds to flock to the city in search of job prospects, to have a taste of and work in or on the most technologically advanced city.

With the release of the AWAKENING patch, sentient AI powered androids are slowly becoming a usual sight. But with rumours of humans literally being replaced by robots being spread around, the hackers and government officials attempt to find the truth behind all the bizarre things that have been happening in the city.
